com.appglu.android.storage
Class StorageApi

java.lang.Object
  com.appglu.android.storage.StorageApi

public final class StorageApi
extends Object

StorageApi has methods to download and cache files from AppGlu server.

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
AppGlu, StorageOperations, AsyncStorageOperations

Method Detail

retrieveInputStreamFromCacheManager

public InputStream retrieveInputStreamFromCacheManager(String url)
Retrieves a file as InputStream from the cache manager if it exist or null if it does not exists.

Parameters:
url - the file URL
Returns:
an InputStream with the content of the file

retrieveByteArrayFromCacheManager

public byte[] retrieveByteArrayFromCacheManager(String url)
Retrieves a file as byte[] from the cache manager if it exist or null if it does not exists.

Parameters:
url - the file URL
Returns:
an byte[] with the content of the file

retrieveBitmapFromCacheManager

public android.graphics.Bitmap retrieveBitmapFromCacheManager(String url)
Retrieves a file as Bitmap from the cache manager if it exist or null if it does not exists.

Parameters:
url - the file URL - must be a image file
Returns:
a Bitmap with the content of the file
See Also:
AppGluUtils.decodeBitmapFromInputStream(InputStream)

retrieveBitmapFromCacheManager

public android.graphics.Bitmap retrieveBitmapFromCacheManager(String url,
                                                              int inSampleSize)
Retrieves a file as Bitmap from the cache manager if it exist or null if it does not exists.

Parameters:
url - the file URL - must be a image file
inSampleSize - how much smaller that the image will be, for example, inSampleSize equals 2 will return an image 1/2 the size of the original
Returns:
a Bitmap with the content of the file
See Also:
AppGluUtils.decodeSampledBitmapFromInputStream(InputStream, int)

retrieveBitmapFromCacheManager

public android.graphics.Bitmap retrieveBitmapFromCacheManager(String url,
                                                              int requestedWidth,
                                                              int requestedHeight)
Retrieves a file as Bitmap from the cache manager if it exist or null if it does not exists.

Parameters:
url - the file URL - must be a image file
requestedWidth - the final image width will be close to the requestedWidth (value is in pixels)
requestedHeight - the final image height will be close to the requestedHeight (value is in pixels)
Returns:
a Bitmap with the content of the file
See Also:
AppGluUtils.decodeSampledBitmapFromByteArray(byte[], int, int)

downloadToImageViewInBackground

public void downloadToImageViewInBackground(String url,
                                            ImageViewAsyncCallback imageViewCallback)
Downloads a file using the URL, converts it to a Bitmap and then make it available through the ImageViewAsyncCallback.

Parameters:
url - the file URL - must be a image file
imageViewCallback - a ImageViewAsyncCallback can be instantiated either with a listener (ImageViewAsyncCallback.ImageDownloadListener) or references to a ImageView, a View to display while loading the image and a View to use as a place holder in the case the image fails loading
See Also:
ImageViewAsyncCallback, AppGluUtils.decodeBitmapFromInputStream(InputStream)

downloadToImageViewInBackground

public void downloadToImageViewInBackground(String url,
                                            int inSampleSize,
                                            ImageViewAsyncCallback imageViewCallback)
Downloads a file using the URL, converts it to a Bitmap and then make it available through the ImageViewAsyncCallback.

Parameters:
url - the file URL - must be a image file
inSampleSize - how much smaller that the image will be, for example, inSampleSize equals 2 will return an image 1/2 the size of the original
imageViewCallback - a ImageViewAsyncCallback can be instantiated either with a listener (ImageViewAsyncCallback.ImageDownloadListener) or references to a ImageView, a View to display while loading the image and a View to use as a place holder in the case the image fails loading
See Also:
ImageViewAsyncCallback, AppGluUtils.decodeSampledBitmapFromInputStream(InputStream, int)

downloadToImageViewInBackground

public void downloadToImageViewInBackground(String url,
                                            int requestedWidth,
                                            int requestedHeight,
                                            ImageViewAsyncCallback imageViewCallback)
Downloads a file using the URL, converts it to a Bitmap and then make it available through the ImageViewAsyncCallback.

Parameters:
url - the file URL - must be a image file
requestedWidth - the final image width will be close to the requestedWidth (value is in pixels)
requestedHeight - the final image height will be close to the requestedHeight (value is in pixels)
imageViewCallback - a ImageViewAsyncCallback can be instantiated either with a listener (ImageViewAsyncCallback.ImageDownloadListener) or references to a ImageView, a View to display while loading the image and a View to use as a place holder in the case the image fails loading
See Also:
ImageViewAsyncCallback, AppGluUtils.decodeSampledBitmapFromByteArray(byte[], int, int)
